success.text: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
success.list: |Attack!: One ally gets +2 to their next roll to Engage in Combat.|Coordinate fire!: All allies get +1 to their next roll to Engage in Combat with firearms while in the fight.|Aim for the head!: You or one of your allies’ Engage in Combat deals +1 Harm.|Take cover!: You or an ally receive 2 Armor against a ranged attack.

partial.text: Get 2 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
partial.list: |Attack!: One ally gets +2 to their next roll to Engage in Combat.|Coordinate fire!: All allies get +1 to their next roll to Engage in Combat with firearms while in the fight.|Aim for the head!: You or one of your allies’ Engage in Combat deals +1 Harm.|Take cover!: You or an ally receive 2 Armor against a ranged attack.

fail.text: You misjudge the situation. Choose whether you have put yourself or one of your allies in harm’s way. The GM makes a Move for your opponent.

name: Ruthless
trigger: Whenever you sacrifice another to save your own skin,

lists.edges: |Human shield: force them to take all the Harm from one attack for you.|Bait: expose someone to danger so you can flank an enemy (deal +1 Harm).|Sacrifice: Leave them to the enemy while you slip away.

success.text: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
success.list: |Human shield: force them to take all the Harm from one attack for you.|Bait: expose someone to danger so you can flank an enemy (deal +1 Harm).|Sacrifice: Leave them to the enemy while you slip away.

partial.text: Get 2 Edges.
partial.list: |Human shield: force them to take all the Harm from one attack for you.|Bait: expose someone to danger so you can flank an enemy (deal +1 Harm).|Sacrifice: Leave them to the enemy while you slip away.

fail.text: Things turns out in a bad way for you instead. The GM makes a Move.

name: Sniper
trigger: Whenever you fire at a distant target utilizing a scoped rifle,

lists.options: |Deal +1 Harm.|Hit another target as well.|Immobilize your target.|Get the target to lose control of something.|You don’t reveal your position. 118

success.text: The shot finds its target. Choose two options.
success.list: |Deal +1 Harm.|Hit another target as well.|Immobilize your target.|Get the target to lose control of something.|You don’t reveal your position. 118

partial.text: The shot finds its target. Choose one option.
partial.list: |Deal +1 Harm.|Hit another target as well.|Immobilize your target.|Get the target to lose control of something.|You don’t reveal your position. 118

fail.text: The shot didn’t go where you intended it to, or you reveal your position to the enemy – expect witnesses, opponents pursuing you as you leave the scene, or other problems. The GM makes a Move.

name: Streetfighter
trigger: Whenever you fight in close combat,

lists.edges: |Dodge: avoid an attack.|Flurry of blows: take +2 on your roll to attack an opponent.|Dirty strike: momentarily stun an opponent by painfully striking them, e.g. on the eye, crotch, or ear…

success.text: Get 3 Edges. You may spend them any time during the scene.
success.list: |Dodge: avoid an attack.|Flurry of blows: take +2 on your roll to attack an opponent.|Dirty strike: momentarily stun an opponent by painfully striking them, e.g. on the eye, crotch, or ear…

partial.text: Get 2 Edges, but the GM also gets to pick one complication:
partial.list: |You risk losing control during the fight (Keep it Together to prevent it).|You earn an enemy, who will try to get back at you later.

fail.text: You’re unfocused and lose control. The GM makes a Move.

name: Survival Instinct
trigger: Whenever you suffer a serious or critical injury yet refuse to yield,
rollPhrase: roll +Violence. On a success, you may temporarily ignore the effects of the injuries, but you will need treatment to stabilize them as soon as the time limit expires:

success.text: You ignore your injuries until the conflict is over, as well as choose one:
success.list: |Viciousness: +1 ongoing to Engage in Combat rolls for the remainder of the fight.|Adrenaline rush: +1 ongoing to Endure Injury rolls for the remainder of the fight.

partial.text: You ignore your injuries until the conflict is over.

fail.text: You overexert yourself and after a few moments your injuries cause you to pass out and collapse. After your next action, the GM decides when and how you pass out.

name: Arcane Researcher
trigger: Whenever you venture into alternate planes of existence or meet entities from other dimensions,

description.static: you may declare that you have read about this dimension or creature before. Ask the GM what you learned from your past studies.

name: At any Cost
trigger: Whenever you truly desire something,

description.static: you may take +2 to a roll by decreasing Stability (−2).

name: Code of Honor
trigger: Whenever you take risks or make sacrifices for your code of honor,

description.intro: You abide by a strict code of honor. Decide its nature when you take this Advantage.
description.static: gain Stability (+1).

description.intro: You are a seasoned marksman.
description.static: Any Harm you deal with a firearm is considered +1 Harm.

name: Desperate
trigger: Whenever you try to make it through overwhelming odds,

description.static: take +1 on all rolls until you’re clear of the threat.

name: Divine Champion
trigger: Whenever you fight your deity’s enemies or fight to protect a sacred object,

description.static: you do +1 Harm and take +1 to Endure Injury. However, if you lose the a battle, your deity becomes irate: You take −1 ongoing to all actions related to your deity until you have atoned for your failure.

name: Elite Sport (Fencing)
trigger: When using swords,

description.intro: You’ve competed professionally in fencing, and know how to wield a sword.
description.static: you can make the attack, Riposte [3], [Distance: arm, attack immediately after parrying], and you have a rapier [Stabbing weapon] at home.

name: Elite Sport (Athletic)
trigger: When running, throwing or catching objects,

description.intro: You’ve competed professionally in an athletic sport (baseball, football, tennis, etc.), through which you have developed your physical capabilities.
description.static: you take +1 ongoing to all relevant rolls.

name: Elite Sport (Contact)
trigger: Whenever you Endure Injury against a close combat attack,

description.intro: You’ve competed professionally in a contact sport (e.g. ice hockey, football), through which you have learned to take a hit.
description.static: take +1 to your roll.

name: Endure Trauma
trigger: Whenever you reduce Stability,

description.intro: You are not as easily affected by trauma as others.
description.static: you always lose 1 fewer level than normal.

name: Eye for an Eye
trigger: Whenever you suffer a serious or critical injury, name the person you feel is responsible.

description.static: You get +2 ongoing to all rolls against them, forever. All rolls targeting the person count, but rolls targeting the person’s family, friends, minions, and property only count if the GM feels they’re applicable.

name: Good Samaritan
trigger: Whenever you help another at your own expense,

description.static: gain Stability (+1).

description.intro: Abuse, violence, self-harm, and assaults have become familiar, and the pain hardly affects you at all anymore.
description.static: You suffer no penalties from wounds, whether serious or critical.

name: Grudge
trigger: When someone directly or indirectly ruins your plans,

description.static: you take +1 ongoing against them until you have taken revenge or received restitution of equal worth to what you lost.

name: Hardened
trigger: Whenever you Endure Injury,

description.static: take +1 to your roll.

name: Jaded
trigger: Whenever you Keep It Together and the result is a Partial Success,

description.static: you may suppress your emotions and postpone their effects until the next scene.

name: Manipulative
trigger: Whenever you do someone a favor or learn one of their secrets,

lists.options: |Take +2 to Influence them.|Take +2 to Hinder them.

description.static: you may later choose one of the options below, by reminding them of your prior services or hint at the secret you know:

name: Opportunist
trigger: Whenever you sacrifice someone else to further your own goals,

description.static: gain Stability (+1).

name: Rage
trigger: When you choose to awaken your inner rage in combat,

lists.edges: |Brutal assault: take +1 Harm to your attack.|Ignore the pain: take +2 to Endure Injury.|Lost in frenzy: shake off and ignore psychological or supernatural influence.

description.static: lose Stability (−1) and mark 1 Rage. Every time you get a wound and every time you defeat a foe, increase Rage (+1). Rage lasts until the end of the combat. During combat, you may spend 1 Rage to choose 1 Edge.

name: Sealed Fate
trigger: Whenever you are dealt a Critical Wound,

description.static: you may mark 1 Time from Condemned to immediately stabilize the Wound.

name: Thirst for Knowledge
trigger: Whenever you learn new information about alternate planes of existence, a supernatural entity, or a Higher Power,

description.static: gain Stability (+1).

name: To the Last Breath
trigger: When you refuse to give in even if the odds turn against you,

description.static: mark 1 Time to reroll the dice.

name: Watchers
trigger: Whenever you are in mortal danger and choose to activate your Watchers,

description.intro: You are being watched over and protected by a group of mysterious people who intend on keeping you alive for their own obscure purposes.
description.static: the GM takes 1 Hold and introduces your Watchers to the scene. Their sole motivation is to keep you out of harm's reach, and the GM can spend Hold on the Watchers' behalf to let them make a Move against you.

suffix.text: The GM chooses the number of Watchers who come to your aid based on the power of the threat to your safety:
suffix.list: |Small Gang: 2 Harm, 5 Wounds|Medium Gang: 3 Harm, 10 Wounds|Large Gang: 3 Harm, 15 Wounds

name: Workaholic
trigger: Whenever you create something or carry out an experiment,

description.static: gain Stability (+1).

name: Worldly
trigger: Whenever you arrive at a new location in the mundane world,

description.static: decide whether you have been here before, and if so, name some detail about the place significant to you. Also, decide if you met someone there and what you left behind. The GM will say what has changed since then.
